OPAL TEAM","details":"The contract integrates with external systems (Gem Factory, Treasury, and a Randomness Coordinator). It allows users to request random GEMs by paying a fee and handles the minting and transfer of GEMs. The contract includes mechanisms for pausing operations and managing fees.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"details":"add admin","params":{"account":"address to add"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize(address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_coordinator":"Address of the  DRBCoordinator contract.","_gemFactory":"Address of the gem factory contract.","_randomPackFees":"Fees for requesting a random pack","_treasury":"Address of the treasury contract."}},"isAdmin(address)":{"details":"whether admin","params":{"account":"address to check"}},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"returns":{"_0":"bytes4 Returns the selector of the onERC721Received function."}},"pause()":{"details":"Only callable by the owner when the contract is not paused."},"rawFulfillRandomWords(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Callback function for the Coordinator to call after the request is fulfilled. This function is called by the Coordinator","params":{"randomWord":"The random number","requestId":"The round of the randomness"}},"removeAdmin()":{"details":"remove admin"},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"requestRandomGem()":{"details":"function has nonReentrant modifier and follows CEIthe function reverts if probabilities were not initialized","returns":{"_0":"uint256 Returns the request ID for the randomness request."}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setCallbackGasLimit(uint32)":{"params":{"_callbackGasLimit":"New gas limit for the callback function."}},"setGemFactory(address)":{"params":{"_gemFactory":"New address of the gem factory contract."}},"setPerfectCommonGemURI(string)":{"params":{"_tokenURI":"New URI for the perfect common GEM."}},"setProbabilities(uint8,uint8,uint8,uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"details":"only callable by the ownerat least 1 probability must be greater than 0the sum of the probability must be equal to 100","params":{"_commonProb":"probability of getting a common gem => must be set in percentage","_epicProb":"probability of getting a epic gem => must be set in percentage","_legendaryProb":"probability of getting a legendary gem => must be set in percentage","_mythicProb":"probability of getting a mythic gem => must be set in percentage","_rareProb":"probability of getting a rare gem => must be set in percentage","_uniqueProb":"probability of getting a unique gem => must be set in percentage"}},"setRandomPackFees(uint256)":{"params":{"_randomPackFees":"New fees for random pack requests."}},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"_treasury":"New address of the treasury contract."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"transfer owner","params":{"newOwner":"new owner address"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Only callable by the owner when the contract is paused."}},"title":"RandomPack Contract for GEM Distribution","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"initialize(address,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Initializes the RandomPack contract with the given parameters."},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Handles the receipt of an ERC721 token."},"pause()":{"notice":"Pauses the contract, preventing getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._gemFactory: Address of the gem factory contract.
params._randomPackFees: Fees for requesting a random pack

returns._0: bytes4 Returns the selector of the onERC721Received function.

pause().details: Only callable by the owner when the contract is not paused.

rawFulfillRandomWords(uint256,uint256).details: Callback function for the Coordinator to call after the request is fulfilled. This function is called by the Coordinator

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestRandomGem().details: function has nonReentrant modifier and follows CEIthe function reverts if probabilities were not initialized

returns._0: uint256 Returns the request ID for the randomness request.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params._callbackGasLimit: New gas limit for the callback function.

params._gemFactory: New address of the gem factory contract.

params._tokenURI: New URI for the perfect common GEM.

setProbabilities(uint8,uint8,uint8,uint8.details: only callable by the ownerat least 1 probability must be greater than 0the sum of the probability must be equal to 100

params._commonProb: probability of getting a common gem => must be set in percentage
params._epicProb: probability of getting a epic gem => must be set in percentage
params._legendaryProb: probability of getting a legendary gem => must be set in percentage
params._mythicProb: probability of getting a mythic gem => must be set in percentage
params._rareProb: probability of getting a rare gem => must be set in percentage
params._uniqueProb: probability of getting a unique gem => must be set in percentage

params._randomPackFees: New fees for random pack requests.

params._treasury: New address of the treasury contract.

unpause().details: Only callable by the owner when the contract is paused.

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Initializes the RandomPack contract with the given parameters.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Handles the receipt of an ERC721 token.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions.

requestRandomGem().notice: Requests a random GEM and pays the required fees.

setCallbackGasLimit(uint32).notice: Sets the gas limit for the callback function.

setGemFactory(address).notice: Sets the address of the gem factory.

setPerfectCommonGemURI(string).notice: Sets the URI for the perfect common GEM.

setProbabilities(uint8,uint8,uint8,uint8.notice: Sets the probability for the fulfillRandomness function based on the rarity

setRandomPackFees(uint256).notice: Sets the fees for requesting a random pack.

setTreasury(address).notice: Sets the address of the treasury.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be performed.
